title: [Physics] Face shields and masks with exhalation valves are not effective at preventing COVID-19 transmission, finds a new droplet dispersal study. (Physics of Fluids journal, 1 September 2020)

[Biology] A SARS-CoV-2 vaccine candidate would likely match all currently circulating variants. Analysis of 18,514 SARS-CoV-2 sequences found no evidence of mutations affecting binding to the ACE2 receptor.
